title: What is the meaning behind every BTS song? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are so many answers to this but let me put it how I understand it So they want to be loved, but heartbreak is constantly in their mind. Through music videos, some people are connecting the storylines and idk this part well so look it up on youtube Here is a new theory— txt sings about how they have horns and the other has wings like the bts album ‍♀️
